messages.content: ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview is a tool that allows users to visualize the styles from the SDXL Prompt Styler.
ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview showcases the capabilities of the SDXL Prompt Styler with preview images.
How can I see how my prompts could appear with the various styles available?
You can view how your prompts could appear with the various styles by looking at the preview images provided in the ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview repository.
What images are included in the repository?
The repository includes preview images from the SDXL Prompt Styler and the SDXL Prompt Styler Advanced.
Where can I find more information about the SDXL Prompt Styler?
For more information about the SDXL Prompt Styler, you can visit the [sdxl_prompt_styler](https://github.com/twri/sdxl_prompt_styler).
Is there a repository that contains custom scripts for ComfyUI?
Yes, you can find custom scripts for ComfyUI in the [ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts).
What version of sdxl was used to generate the preview images?
The preview images in the project were generated using sdxl version 1.0.
